item.title: Minecraft Server on Docker guide
item.description: Step 1: Install Docker This will depend on platform/os but most people (e.g running some form of linux on an x64 cpu) should be able to run the code below. (Note you do need to ) curl -fsSL https://get.docker.com -o get-docker.sh   sh get-docker.sh Step 2: Run hello-world on docker to see if Docker is functional Now that we have Docker installed, we need to see if its functional so that it can succsessfully run our minecraft server.
